How about texturing certain parts in KSP? like adding gold/copper foils? They would be mainly for cosmetics but it would be cool. I was always frustrated that some of my probes and satellite didn't look like probes and satellite.

And shouldn't solar panels reflect more light? They seem a bit on the Matte side.

Edited September 7, 2013 by LostElement

Change the thread's title.

I clicked with scepticism just because of it.

Aye, please make sure you have a descriptive title. It's too ambiguous. Foils... well, I suppose you could eventually. However, keep in mind that until we have proper stock fairings/payload parts, it is highly unlikely that you'll see any parts looking so fragile As to solar panels... well, kind the the entire point of solar panels is that they absorb light. That is their function. Ideal solar panels would be jet black, never reflecting any light whatsoever. The ones we have are plenty shiny
I have solar panels, and they are very reflective. They do have tinted glass. or at least it look tinted
